snippet: Mauricio Pochettino has given short shrift to reports suggesting Eric Dier is set to leave Tottenham Hotspur, saying the England midfielder's will be staying at White Hart Lane for a good while yet....

headline.main: Tottenham's Pochettino Shoots Down Talk of Dier Exit
headline.print_headline: Tottenham's Pochettino Shoots Down Talk of Dier Exit

lead_paragraph: Mauricio Pochettino has given short shrift to reports suggesting Eric Dier is set to leave Tottenham Hotspur, saying the England midfielder's will be staying at White Hart Lane for a good while yet.

snippet: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp is unlikely to make any major moves in the January transfer window despite injuries and Sadio Mane's upcoming trip to the African Nations Cup, he said on Friday....

headline.main: Liverpool's Klopp Rules Out January Spending Spree
headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Klopp Rules Out January Spending Spree

snippet: Arsenal, accustomed to falling apart in November, dropped from first to fourth in the Premier League in a week in mid-December, amid contract demands from two stars....

headline.main: Arsenal Can’t Avoid Collapse, or Paying Its Stars
headline.print_headline: A Collapse as Foreseeable as a Pay Dispute

abstract: Rory Smith On Soccer column underscores degree to which Arsenal must do all it can to retain forward Alexis Sanchez and midfielder Mesut Ozil as team experiences its yearly collapse; notes that while players are demanding significant pay increase, it is clear Arsenal cannot hope to perform better without them.
lead_paragraph: Arsenal, accustomed to falling apart in November, dropped from first to fourth in the Premier League in a week in mid-December, amid contract demands from two stars.

snippet: Chelsea's clash with Premier League title rivals Manchester City will not define their season and the games against lesser teams will be more significant, goalkeeper Thibaut Courtois said....
